line.text: "Welcome, welcome! We've got everything you need here, all under one admittedly rickety roof. What can I help you with?"
"Hey there, good to see you again! So, what do you need?"

scene.choice: I'm looking for Andre Wallace. You seen him?

line.text: The shopkeeper looks down his glasses at you.
"I see a lot of people. This 'Andre', who are you to him?"

scene.choice: Nobody. I've been hired to investigate his disappearance.

line.text: The shopkeeper sighs. His gaze softens.
"It's about time. Been worried something happened to him."
The shopkeeper's gaze briefly shifts to the window, then back to you. He chuckles, but his eyes remain cold.
"Funny. I've met Andre's friends. Lovely people, mostly. But I don't know you. Who are you, really?"
"No no, that's none of my business. Unless you wanted information from me, in which case I would suggest you answer my questions truthfully."
